name: MEC Ace Liner Shorts - Women's
description:
Don't keep this Ace up your sleeve, but under your favourite shorts or pants. The moisture-wicking fabric, flat-locked seams and chamois will enhance your riding comfort and fits neatly under mountain bike shorts, jeans or commuting trousers.Made of polyester jersey with 16% spandex for great stretch and excellent memory.Durable, wicking finish has a smooth surface and manages moisture for a comfortable ride.Chamois pads is rated for medium distance rides. Centre is 8mm open-cell foam, perimeter is 1mm.6-panel construction for a good, sleek fit.Low-profile elastic waist reduces bulk.Flat-locked seams eliminate chafing.Gripper elastic in legs keeps them from rolling up.

Body fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
